value:
SELECT
SRC.src_sys_cd,
SRC.ref_id,
SRC.ref_cd, 
SRC.ref_desc,
SRC.ref_alt_val,
SRC.mkt_key,
SRC.mkt_ref_code,
SRC.mkt_ref_code_desc,
SRC.mkt_ref_code_alt_val,
SRC.gbl_key,
SRC.gbl_ref_code,
SRC.gbl_ref_code_desc,
SRC.ref_type_cd,
SRC.ref_data_set_cd,
SRC.ref_rec_eff_dtm,
SRC.rec_exp_dtm,
SRC.row_process_dtm,
SRC.etl_audit_id,
LKP.MAX_SID
FROM
(
SELECT
STG.src_sys_cd,
STG.ref_id,
STG.ref_cd, 
STG.ref_desc,
STG.ref_alt_val,
STG.mkt_key,
STG.mkt_ref_code,
STG.mkt_ref_code_desc,
STG.mkt_ref_code_alt_val,
STG.gbl_key,
STG.gbl_ref_code,
STG.gbl_ref_code_desc,
STG.ref_type_cd,
STG.ref_data_set_cd,
STG.ref_rec_eff_dtm,
STG.rec_exp_dtm,
STG.row_process_dtm,
STG.etl_audit_id,
1 AS DUMMY
FROM cdp_stg_dwh.stg_tref_code_map_variant STG
WHERE LOWER(STG.ref_type_cd)='coverage_code'
AND STG.src_sys_cd='axis' ) AS SRC
LEFT JOIN (SELECT 1 as DUMMY, max(dim_cov_key) AS MAX_SID from cdp_dwh.dim_cov_type_t) LKP
ON LKP.DUMMY=SRC.DUMMY

SELECT
SRC.dim_cov_key,
SRC.src_sys_cd,
SRC.cov_cd FROM cdp_dwh.dim_cov_type_t SRC
WHERE SRC.src_sys_cd='axis'
